common.namesUsedForAllGames: These names will be used for all games

borderland.title: The Borderland
borderland.subtitle: 52 cards - 4 rules - 0 mercy
borderland.description: Draw a card, discover its power. Give out sips, or drink them. Challenge if you dare. Survive if you can.

rules.title: Borderland Rules
rules.intro: Each card suit has its own rule.

contest.title: The Contest
contest.description: You can contest a card to double the stakes! The next player can accept or escalate (x2, then x4). Whoever accepts drinks it all. Courage or madness?

clubs.title: The Guess
clubs.description: The card is FACE DOWN. Ask a player to guess its exact value (e.g., King). Tap to reveal. If they're right, you give out. If not, they drink.

diamonds.title: The Action
diamonds.description: Give an action to the player of your choice.

hearts.title: The Question
hearts.description: Ask a question to the player of your choice.

spades.title: The Challenge
spades.description: Give a challenge to accomplish to the player of your choice.
